org.ocast.sdk.core

Class DeviceCenter

  • org.ocast.sdk.core.DeviceCenter

  • public class DeviceCenter

    This class is the entry point to discover and use OCast devices.

    In order to receive discovery events, you first need to register a device class by calling the registerDevice(@NotNull Class deviceClass) method. Then add a interface DeviceListener with addDeviceListener(@NotNull DeviceListener listener) and start the discovery with resumeDiscovery().

    See Also:
    interface DeviceListener

        @NotNull
public java.util.List<org.ocast.sdk.core.Device> getDevices()

        The list of detected OCast devices.

      • getDiscoveryInterval

        public long getDiscoveryInterval()

        The interval to refresh the devices, in milliseconds.

        Minimum value is 5000 milliseconds. Setting this property results in sending an SSDP M-SEARCH request immediately if discovery is on-going.

      • setDiscoveryInterval

        public void setDiscoveryInterval(long value)

        The interval to refresh the devices, in milliseconds.

        Minimum value is 5000 milliseconds. Setting this property results in sending an SSDP M-SEARCH request immediately if discovery is on-going.

      • onCreateDevice

        protected void onCreateDevice(@NotNull
                              Device device)

        This method is called when an OCast device has been created and before it is added to the list of detected devices.

        Default implementation does nothing. This method is meant to be overridden by subclasses.

        Parameters:
        device - The device to add.

      • onRemoveDevice

        protected void onRemoveDevice(@NotNull
                              Device device)

        This method is called before an OCast device is removed from the list of detected devices.

        Default implementation does nothing. This method is meant to be overridden by subclasses.

        Parameters:
        device - The device to remove.

      • registerDevice

        public void registerDevice(@NotNull
                           java.lang.Class<? extends org.ocast.sdk.core.Device> deviceClass)

        Registers a class of devices to discover.

        Parameters:
        deviceClass - The class of devices that will be searched during the discovery process.

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove.

      • resumeDiscovery

        public boolean resumeDiscovery()

        Resumes the discovery process.

        Newly initialized instances of class DeviceCenter begin in a paused state, so you need to call this method to start the discovery.

        Returns:
        true if the discovery was successfully resumed, false if there was an issue or if the discovery was already running.
        See Also:
        class DeviceCenter

      • stopDiscovery

        public boolean stopDiscovery()

        Stops the discovery process.

        This clears the list of detected devices if the discovery was not in a paused state.

        Returns:
        true if the discovery was successfully stopped, false if the discovery was already stopped.

      • pauseDiscovery

        public boolean pauseDiscovery()

        Pauses the discovery process.

        This does not clear the list of detected devices.

        Returns:
        true if the discovery was successfully paused, false if the discovery was not running.
